title.rendered: Falanx Cyber is Exhibiting at CompTIA EMEA Conference 2019

content.rendered:
Falanx Cyber is exhibiting at the 2019 CompTIA EMEA Member & Partner Conference at the Park Plaza, Westminster Bridge in London on 7th and 8th October. For anyone that builds, sells, distributes or influences the adoption of technology solutions within the EMEA IT channel this is a not-to-be-missed event. This is also the premier event for the CompTIA partner Programme community to engage in face-to-face communications, build new contacts, learn new skills and drive their businesses forward.

 

Book a meeting with Falanx Cyber at CompTIA

Book Meeting

Are you a partner and want to attend CompTIA annual conference at no cost?

Falanx Cyber has a number free tickets for our partners to benefit from.

Register for Free

Why Partner with Falanx Cyber?

The opportunities in Cyber are significant for MSPs, but how can you know whether you’re providing the right services to prevent your clients from suffering a Cyber-attack? Falanx Cyber’s mission is to put Enterprise-class cyber security services within the reach of every organisation. Enhance your portfolio using Falanx Cyber’s suite of Cyber security services to generate profitable revenue streams, secure your clients and win new business.

Become a Partner
